alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:13PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds from weakening thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern El Paso and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 712 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds from weakening thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Rush to 6 miles southwest of Truckton to near Hanover. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern El Paso and northeastern Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
